```{r, result = "hide"}

library(devtools)
install_github("pbhatt33/RandomLetter")
library(randomLetter)

start1 <- Sys.time()
lapply(1:1000000, function(...){randomLetter::random_letter()})
end1 <- Sys.time()



library(parallel)
detectCores()
no_cores <- detectCores()-1
cl <- makeCluster(no_cores)

start2 <- Sys.time()
parLapply(cl, 1:1000000, function(...){return(randomLetter::random_letter())})
end2 <- Sys.time()

stopCluster(cl)


```

```{r}

end1-start1
end2-start2 

```
